::Shadow Wing::

"Oh he can be the most stubborn, irritating, nerve racking wolf, 
grrrr."  she tranformed into her owl mode and flew off to the ark.  
If was going to be a pain in the neck about it, then fine.  She went 
into the ship and transformed into bot mode.  She went to the armory 
and looked for a better weapon than the little gun that she had. 


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> (Better not just be a certain one)
> 
> "Four are you happy now?" Lunarpine hoped that would satisfy her 
curiosity.
> His eyesight was damaged but it was still there. he just lost dwpth
> perception and color. he'd be fine as long as he didn't have to 
fight long
> distanse. that was OK too, he preferred the feeling of mech fluid 
running
> down his claws anyway.
> 
> Lunarpine turned and started toward the door. They had a chance to 
mark
> Megatrons tril, but it was gone now. Shadow Wing stood there and 
argued with
> him over an irrelevant point instead of taking advantage of a 
tactical
> advantage.
> "Tell Ramhorn my comms open if he needs me, I'll be elsewhere."
> 
> Lunarpine exit stage left.
